Blog post ideas: 
- Analysis of Alberta agrivoltaic potential: https://www.goodnewsnetwork.org/crops-thrive-underneath-of-solar-panels/

Jekyll Tutorial: 

- https://jekyllthemes.io/jekyll-blog-themes
- https://programminghistorian.org/en/lessons/building-static-sites-with-jekyll-github-pages
- Consider having sites on sites! I.e. for photography, use a different theme.
